p: We found few differences between the mean environmental conditions in presences and pseudo-absences records of P. pinaster (see Table 3 and S2a Fig), an outcome that was expected given the low explained deviance scores obtained by most of its environmental predictors (see Table 1). Nevertheless, this analysis only considered environmental variables individually, and the SDM fitted for P. pinaster, which considers altogether the set of selected environmental variables, had an acceptable performance as revealed by its TSS score (0.69) and its sensitivity and specificity values (93.50 and 75.30 respectively).
